summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to other attorneys on the Ghislaine Maxwell defense team, providing a courtesy copy of a court filing (Reply to Docket 423) in the case U.S. v. Maxwell, and updating her contact information.

events.title: Filing of Reply to Docket 423
events.description: The defense team files a reply brief in the case U.S. v. Maxwell, as indicated by the attached PDF and the email's purpose.

keyFacts: The document is an email from November 9, 2021, among Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorneys.
It transmits a courtesy copy of a court filing (Reply to Docket 423) in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330).
Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim updates her office address and preferred email address for the defense team.
The email confirms the active legal defense proceedings in late 2021, close to Maxwell's trial.
The communication is marked as potentially confidential/privileged, indicating sensitive attorney-client work.
